response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a significant discount compared to its market value of $15,000, reflecting my confidence in its ability to meet your requirements. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your budget and expectations. I'm looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
